title: Emerald & Diamond Cascading Jhumka Earrings
materials: Brilliant-Cut Diamonds (1.20 carats total). Hyderabadi Polish for a radiant shine.
features: Elaborate floral-inspired Jhumka design with cascading diamond and emerald arrangement. Oval emeralds are bezel-set, surrounded by a halo of sparkling diamonds. Features delicate milgrain detailing for a touch of vintage elegance. Lightweight design for comfortable wear.
occasions: and special occasions where you want to make a statement.
description: Exquisite craftsmanship blending traditional Jhumka design with modern gemstone settings. Genuine emeralds and diamonds sourced for their exceptional quality. A timeless heirloom piece that can be passed down through generations. Lightweight and comfortable to wear, despite the intricate design. Represents prosperity and good fortune, making it a perfect bridal adornment.
